title: Privacy Policy
intro: Your privacy matters. This policy explains what data we collect, why we collect it, and how we handle it in Egypt.

controller.title: Who controls your data
controller.body: AqarDot.com acts as the data controller for information processed through our website and apps.

dataWeCollect.title: Data we collect
items: Account info: name, email, phone (if provided).
Listing details you publish (photos, prices, addresses you choose to share).
Usage data: device info, pages viewed, basic analytics.
Messages you send via our contact forms.

useOfData.title: How we use data
items: Provide and improve our services and features.
Show relevant property results and prevent fraud.
Communicate about your account, listings, or support requests.

legalBasis.title: Legal basis
items: Your consent (e.g., when you submit forms).

sharing.title: Sharing
sharing.body: We do not sell your personal data. We may share limited data with service providers (e.g., hosting, email) under confidentiality obligations, or when required by law.

retention.title: Retention
retention.body: We keep data only as long as needed for the purposes above or as required by applicable law, then delete or anonymize it.

security.title: Security
security.body: We use reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect data. No method of transmission or storage is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: Your rights
items: Access, correct, or delete your data.
Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent.
Object to certain processing where permitted by law.
yourRights.contact: To exercise rights, contact us at contact@aqardot.com.

international.title: International transfers
international.body: If we use providers outside Egypt, we implement appropriate safeguards to protect your data.
